xwikidoc.name: ManageWorkspace
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Workspace
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} #set ($workspaceId = $xcontext.database) #set ($WorkspaceManager = $services.workspaceManager) ## ## TODO: use a dependency check macro. ## #set ($workspace = $WorkspaceManager.getWorkspace($workspaceId)) #if (!$workspace) #if (!$xcontext.lastexception) {{error}}The workspace '$workspaceId' does not exist.{{/error}} #elseif("${xcontext.lastexception.message}" != '') {{error}}$xcontext.lastexception.message{{/error}} #else {{error}}$xcontext.lastexception.class{{/error}} #end #else #set($wikiDocument = $workspace.wikiDocument) {{html clean='false' wiki='true'}}
$msg.get('workspacemanager.prop.wikiprettyname.hint')
((($wikiDocument.display('wikiprettyname', 'edit'))))
$msg.get('workspacemanager.prop.description.hint')
((($wikiDocument.display('description', 'edit'))))
$msg.get('workspacemanager.prop.owner.hint')
((($wikiDocument.display('owner', 'edit'))))
$msg.get('workspacemanager.prop.membershipType.hint')
((($wikiDocument.display('membershipType', 'edit'))))

{{/html}} #end {{/velocity}}
